sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_62500_mealplan_recipe"> <x_62500_mealplan_recipe action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <active>true</active> <cook_time>1970-01-01 00:15:00</cook_time> <cooking_instructions>1. Drain canned tuna and transfer to a bowl. 2. Add mayonnaise, lemon juice, and Dijon mustard. 3. Finely chop celery, red onion, and pickles, then add to the bowl. 4. Mix until well combined. 5. Toast bread and assemble sandwiches with lettuce, tomato, and tuna salad.</cooking_instructions> <cuisine display_value="Global">eb81cf979755021069a3b6fce053af07</cuisine> <diet/> <effort display_value="Easy">fae0a76e9730021069a3b6fce053af3e</effort> <image/> <ingredients>Canned Tuna (1 can), Mayonnaise (2 tbsp)</ingredients> <meal_type display_value="Lunch">617596df9751021069a3b6fce053af66</meal_type> <name>Tuna Salad Sandwich</name> <nutrition>Calories: 300, Protein: 20g, Fat: 15g, Carbs: 20g</nutrition> <owned_by display_value="MP Admin">cbb877e697b0021069a3b6fce053af41</owned_by> <pre_cook>false</pre_cook> <prep_instructions>1. Chop celery, red onion, and pickles.</prep_instructions> <prep_required>false</prep_required> <prep_time>1970-01-01 00:10:00</prep_time> <serving>2</serving> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2024-04-07 01:00:29</sys_created_on> <sys_id>b0ac87979795021069a3b6fce053afa2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2024-05-01 06:39:10</sys_updated_on> <time_of_day/> </x_62500_mealplan_recipe> </record_update>
